ogp_title: giqhub - Ask about GitHub repositories easily & for free!
ogp_description: giqhub is a free, open-source service that lets you ask questions about public GitHub repositories. When you're unsure about a repo's contents or want to understand the intent behind some code, you can easily ask questions to deepen your understanding. Fast, easy, and free – anyone can use it!
top_title: giqhub - Ask about GitHub repositories easily & for free!
top_header_description: Ask about GitHub repositories easily & for free!
top_about_description: **giqhub** is a free, open-source service that lets you **ask questions about public GitHub repositories**. When you're unsure about a repo's contents or want to understand the intent behind some code, you can **easily ask questions** to deepen your understanding. **Fast, easy, and free** – anyone can use it!
top_how_to_use_description: Just replace {t} with {q} in the GitHub URL to use it.
top_how_to_use_example: For example, if you want to ask a question about the {github} repository, just access {giqhub}.
top_features_free_description: Anyone can use it for free, and the source code is open source.
top_features_easy_description: You can ask questions about GitHub repositories with a simple URL change.
top_features_flexible_description: You can ask any questions about any public repository, making it suitable for a wide range of use cases.
top_try_description: You can easily experience giqhub by changing the URL of a GitHub repository.
top_contribute_description: giqhub is an open-source project. We welcome pull requests for adding features and improvements. Please join us!
top_contribute_details: For more details, please see the {link_opening_tag}GitHub repository{link_closing_tag}.
repository_error_llm_already_processing: LLM is already processing a query
repository_not_supported_browser: Gemini model is not supported in this browser
sample_query_1: What is the purpose of this repository?
sample_query_2: How do I use this repository with an example?
sample_query_3: What are the features of this repository?
link_twitter_text:
giqhub - Ask about GitHub repositories easily & for free!
giqhub is a free, open-source service that lets you ask questions about public GitHub repositories.
gemini_copied_to_clipboard: For security reasons, the link has been copied because it cannot be opened automatically. Please paste it into the browser's address bar.
gemini_modal_description: Gemini is currently not available. Please enable the following flags in Chrome and try again.
gemini_restart: Restart Chrome after enabling the flags.
chatgpt_modal_title: An API key is required to use ChatGPT
chatgpt_modal_footnote: Recommended: In Chrome, free LLMs are available in the browser, so you don't need to enter any API key.
setting_github_api_key_description: Enter your API key to increase the request limit for the GitHub API.
setting_chat_gpt_api_key_description: Enter your API key to use ChatGPT. This is only required if you want to use ChatGPT.
setting_chat_gpt_api_key_link_text: Where do I find my OpenAI API Key?
setting_llm_type_description: Select the type of LLM you want to use.
setting_language_description: Select the language you want to use.
github_ratelimit_exceeded: The request limit for the GitHub API has been exceeded. Please try again in an hour or enter your API key.
github_bad_credentials: The GitHub API key is invalid. Please enter a valid API key.
chatgpt_api_key_incorrect: The ChatGPT API key is invalid. Please enter a valid API key.
